note.p: Education: Harrow School; MA (Balliol College, Oxford)
Career: Queen's Printer; died from Typhoid Fever.
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1884-1885 vol 38 pp xxxiv-xxxix signed by A B K
References: Roy M MacLeod, 'The X-Club: A Social Network of Science in Late-Victorian England' in NR 1969 vol 24 pp 305-322
Marie Boas Hall, 'The Royal Society in Thomas Henry Huxley's Time' in NR 1983-84 vol 38 pp 153-158
